Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm

Class ShutdownHook

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm.ShutdownHook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<ShutdownHook>
public class ShutdownHook extends Object implements Comparable<ShutdownHook>
Adds serial execution of shutdown hooks to the functionality provided by Runtime.addShutdownHook(Thread). When the virtual machine shuts down, the hooks registered with ShutdownHook will be called sequentially according to the ordering provided when the hooks were registered with register(String, Order, Duration, Runnable).

Hooks can request that they be run ShutdownHook.Order.FIRST, ShutdownHook.Order.MIDDLE or ShutdownHook.Order.LAST. The order of execution hooks assigned the same ShutdownHook.Order is not defined. Otherwise hooks will be executed in sorted order, from ShutdownHook.Order.FIRST to ShutdownHook.Order.LAST.

NOTE:

This class simply allows pre-registered shutdown hooks to be run in a defined order during VM shutdown. For more complex shutdown hook requirements, see com.mastfrog:shutdown-hooks.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    ShutdownHook.Order
    The order that a hook should be run in, either among the set of first hooks, or among the set of last hooks.

    • register

      public static void register(String name, ShutdownHook.Order order, Duration maximumWait, Runnable code)
      Registers the given shutdown hook code to run in the given serial order.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the shutdown hook
      order - The ShutdownHook.Order in which the hook should run. Hooks with the same ShutdownHook.Order execute in an undefined order.
      maximumWait - The maximum time to wait for the hook's code to complete
      code - The shutdown hook code to run when the VM shuts down.
